about_the_game:
Embark on a daring journey into the post-apocalyptic world of Hentai Senpai: Apocalypse Girls. Navigate through a desolate wasteland fraught with perilous puzzles and thrilling encounters, where every triumph brings you closer to uncovering the most alluring of survivors!

🧩 Puzzle Features:

  • Engage your mind with two classic puzzle types: swapping and rotating. Strategize your moves to overcome the challenges of the wasteland!

🔥 Uncover Apocalypse Beauties:

  • Unlock the secrets of 56 captivating survivors, each brimming with resilience and allure. Survive and thrive in the aftermath!

🖼️ Survivor Gallery:

  • Explore the depths of the Apocalypse Girls with ease. Delve into the seduction of each survivor through a user-friendly gallery interface.

❤️ Favorites System:

  • Select your most cherished Apocalypse Girls for quick access. Bond with the Apocalypse Girls amidst the chaos and let their beauty guide you!

📷 Immersive Visuals:

  • Witness the Apocalypse Girls in stunning 5K detail. Let the haunting beauty of the Apocalypse Girls captivate your senses!

🎵 Enigmatic Soundtrack:

  • Immerse yourself in the electric fusion of country and jazz melodies. Let the music of the apocalypse accompany you on your journey with the Apocalypse Girls!

⚙️ Technical Customization:

  • Tailor your gaming experience to your preferences. Fine-tune settings such as resolution, fullscreen mode, framerate, and more. Adapt to the challenges ahead!



Embark on a quest through the desolate landscapes of Hentai Senpai: Apocalypse Girls, where your wit and skill in solving puzzles unveil the beauty and strength of the survivors amidst the ruins.

All characters depicted are adults (18+).

content_descriptors.notes:
Hentai Senpai: Apocalypse Girls contains graphic sexual content including nudity, sex, genitalia, masturbation & bodily fluids.
All characters are adults (18+).

name: Hentai Senpai: Apocalypse Girls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required for sweet country and jazz tunes
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.

short_description: Embark on a post-apocalyptic odyssey in Hentai Senpai: Apocalypse Girls. Solve puzzles, unlock 56 captivating survivors, and immerse yourself in 5K visuals. Customize your experience, all to the electric fusion of country and jazz tunes amidst the ruins.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
